name: Sky Conqueror
description:
The game tells a story about a crazy skydiver, who decided that for an extreme jump with a parachute... he doesn't need a parachute. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of air travel, avoid obstacles, dodge them, maneuver... Do everything to make the dream of the extreme - conquer the sky - come true!

Key features:


  • Dynamic gameplay
  • Gradually increasing complexity
  • Online leaderboard
  • Achievements system
  • Minimalistic graphics
